item.title: Donald Trump Renews Global Trade War With Canada Facing 35% Tariff
item.description: President Donald Trump has launched a fresh assault on global trading partners with Canada likely to be among the worst hit. In a letter sent to its northern neighbor late on Thursday, Trump said the
